title: Development of Methodologies for Designing and Operating Massive Open Online Language Courses (MOOCs)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and foundational comprehension of language learning principles
context.additional_context: Developing a MOOC design process using mixed research methodologies (quantitative/qualitative analysis) and exploring methods for applying it to technological platforms like Moodle

learning_goals: Learners can explain five or more core elements at each MOOC design stage (goal setting, content development, assessment design)
Learners can perform learner needs analysis and effectiveness verification procedures using mixed research methodologies
Learners can design and apply three or more LMS-based interaction strategies
Learners can develop a learning performance measurement system using formative assessment tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
